description.value: The administrativeGenderCode extension attribute allows for the biological distinction between male and female where there is inconsistency between anatomical and chromosomal characteristics, sex is based on anatomical characteristics.

short.value: ADHA CDA extension to represent administrative gender code

definition.value: The administrativeGenderCode extension attribute allows for the biological distinction between male and female where there is inconsistency between anatomical and chromosomal characteristics, sex is based on anatomical characteristics.
